accordion.title: Accordion
accordion.description: A dropdown component for toggling content

accordion-group.title: Accordion Group
accordion-group.description: Group multiple accordions into a single display

card.title: Card
card.description: Highlight main points or links with customizable icons

card-group.title: Cards
card-group.description: Show cards side by side in a grid format

file-tree.title: File Tree
file-tree.description: Show a file tree with expandable folders

tabs.title: Tabs
tabs.description: Toggle content using the Tabs component

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: Show a series of steps in a process

callout.title: Callout
callout.description: Highlight important information with a callout

image-frame.title: Image Frame
image-frame.description: Use the Frame component to wrap images or other components in a container

tooltip.title: Tooltip
tooltip.description: Show a tooltip when hovering over an element

toast.title: Toast
toast.description: Show a toast message to the user
